name: OnePass: A password manager UI Kit
description:
OnePass

With a growing number of platforms, accounts and eventually passwords, it has become difficult to manage and remember all the passwords. To tackle this, many people either use the same password on multiple platforms or use simple passwords that are easy to crack.

OnePass, among a few existing solutions, aims to solve this problem by letting users keep all their passwords in one secure place with a few more useful features.

  1. Store and Manage Passwords
  2. Autofill Credentials
  3. Check for compromised websites


The UI Kit

The UI Kit is a collection of 45+ pixel-perfect screens that visually represent OnePass as an app. The UI Kit uses column grids as well as components. You can duplicate the UI Kit from Figma Community via the link or download the design file for Figma or Adobe XD.


Features:

  • 45+ pixel-perfect screens
  • Light and Dark modes
  • Easy to Customize
  • FREE
